content: MOSQUITTO_ENABLED : Whether Mosquitto should be installed by this chart or not. Default: true MOSQUITTO_MUTUAL_TLS : Whether Mosquitto sohuld be configured for mutual TLS. Default: false MOSQUITTO_SUPERUSER : The name of the supe-user account. This account will be able to freely publish and subscribe to/from any topic. When enabling TLS, this should be equal to the CN of the certificate. Default: esthesis MOSQUITTO_CA_CERT : The certificate of the CA, encoded in Base64. MOSQUITTO_SERVER_CERT : The certificate of the mosquitto server, encoded in Base64. MOSQUITTO_SERVER_KEY : The private key of the mosquitto server, encoded in Base64. MOSQUITTO_SERVICE_TYPE : The type of the service to expose Mosquitto by. Default: ClusterIP
